title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: The equioment is more for attack not for defendWell it's been long plan it failed many times but now it could be possible.Russia have all the Nice things such us oil gold gas so USA want this.The best way to entry in russia Will be trough Baltics countries.It's not just USA all world dream about to get russian land there is everthing you need oil gas and food fotest. So NATO together with HIMRas attackers getting ready to go in russia.Can russia defend ? I dont think so it's likely that russia Will be taken over by USA and Europe Will buy USD to get russian oil.Anyone who knows about military can see that USA in baltics prepare for attacking not for defending.Anyways it's logical becouse we all want russian resources gas oil gold and all the food.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: The US Navy is present in the Baltic waters before the outbreak of the Ukrainian war, according to military cooperation agreements within the framework of NATO. The Baltic Sea is an open space and most reports refer to the presence of the Russian Navy and even the presence of some submarines. I mean, it will not be easy for America or any country to mobilize its forces in the Baltic Sea in preparation for an attack without Russia realizing it.I rule out a military confrontation between the two forces in the near future. A new cold war could last for years.

Â And the only way to make those Russian 'nice things' radioactive, might make the whole world radioactive... Doomsday War.

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: Quote from: Fullbear2222 on December 09, 2022, 06:41:11 PMAnyways it's logical becouse we all want russian resources gas oil gold and all the food.If that's the case, it simply means this war was already planned, because I see no reason why they have to just make it look as if Russia can't defend themselves. And now they want to make Russia look like the bad guy...I just see USA trying to get something by force and with the kind of person Putin is, is not going to be easy at all.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Quote from: Majestic-milf on December 10, 2022, 08:32:05 PMQuote from: Fullbear2222 on December 09, 2022, 06:41:11 PMAnyways it's logical becouse we all want russian resources gas oil gold and all the food.If that's the case, it simply means this war was already planned, because I see no reason why they have to just make it look as if Russia can't defend themselves. And now they want to make Russia look like the bad guy...I just see USA trying to get something by force and with the kind of person Putin is, is not going to be easy at all.The war WAS planned by the US and the world banking money elite. They were powerful enough to set the Bolsheviks in power back in the early 1900s. But they weren't powerful enough to keep their stranglehold on this new Russia they put into power.They have been trying ever since to take their power over Russia back. But Russia is thwarting them at every turn.

comments.author: worldofcoins
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on December 10, 2022, 06:10:40 AMThe US Navy is present in the Baltic waters before the outbreak of the Ukrainian war, according to military cooperation agreements within the framework of NATO. The Baltic Sea is an open space and most reports refer to the presence of the Russian Navy and even the presence of some submarines. I mean, it will not be easy for America or any country to mobilize its forces in the Baltic Sea in preparation for an attack without Russia realizing it.I rule out a military confrontation between the two forces in the near future. A new cold war could last for years.I think the chances of war between Russia and the USA are minimal. Because it would have a significant impact on the rest of the countries all around the world. The situation then would be like do or die for both countries. Everything would be at risk. So, let's rule out the chances of war between Russia and the USA.

comments.body: Quote from: TwitchySeal on December 21, 2022, 05:19:21 AMQuote from: BADecker on December 20, 2022, 05:03:03 PMQuote from: worldofcoins on December 20, 2022, 02:51:45 PMQuote from: Kavelj22 on December 10, 2022, 06:10:40 AMThe US Navy is present in the Baltic waters before the outbreak of the Ukrainian war, according to military cooperation agreements within the framework of NATO. The Baltic Sea is an open space and most reports refer to the presence of the Russian Navy and even the presence of some submarines. I mean, it will not be easy for America or any country to mobilize its forces in the Baltic Sea in preparation for an attack without Russia realizing it.I rule out a military confrontation between the two forces in the near future. A new cold war could last for years.I think the chances of war between Russia and the USA are minimal. Because it would have a significant impact on the rest of the countries all around the world. The situation then would be like do or die for both countries. Everything would be at risk. So, let's rule out the chances of war between Russia and the USA.Except for one little detail. It's happening in Ukraine right now. Ukraine is the battle ground, and the Ukraine government is a puppet of the US.There's a very big difference between a country that's helping other countries fight wars and a country that's actively fighting a literal war.There's a difference between, people, rocks, and everything else. The point is that if a country supports another country in a particular action, the supporting country is just as guilty of doing the action as the country that actually does it. In the case of the US supporting Ukraine, the US did it through government coups, thereby conquering Ukraine. Just because we don't see this takeover advertised, doesn't mean it didn't happen.
